title: The Queen of England Boxed Set: Coronation, Grand Tour, Ascension
description: Told over three fast-paced novels, newly crowned Queen Juliette prepares for the battle of her life. Set in an alternate history, ascending the throne of England after the untimely death of Victoria, young Juliette must battle the secretive and nefarious New World Order, attempt to find a suitable husband, and secure the mysterious Excalibur as others circle her throne. With an eclectic supporting cast, Juliette's adventures take her not only through London, but across Europe. With a balance of romance and other fantastical steampunk elements, fans of Gail Carriger, Shanna Swendson, and Colleen Gleason wonâ€™t want to miss out on this exciting series.
author: Courtney Brandt
